description: Details of external noise level part pursuant to condition 5 part discharge (condition 5B - post installation sound assessment) of planning permission ref: 223462FUL dated 21/12/2022 for: Replacement of timber door and frame to High Street elevation, installation of new door to rear elevation and installation of plant and extraction system to existing commercial premises (at ground floor)
decision_conditions: The submitted details of external noise level part pursuant to condition 5 part discharge (condition 5B - post installation sound assessment) of planning permission ref: 223462FUL dated 21/12/2022, are deemed to be unsatisfactory and do not meet the requirements of the condition. The proposal would therefore fail to comply with National Planning Policy Framework 2021 sections 2 and 12, London Plan 2021 policy D14, Ealing's Core Strategy 2012, Ealing Development Management DPD 2013 policy 7A and Ealing's Draft New Local Plan (Reg.18) policy DAA.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
